import React, { useState } from "react"; const PopupCard = ({ onClose }) => { const [title, setTitle] = useState(); const [description, setDescription] = useState(); const [subTask, setSubTask] = useState(); const [status, setStatus] = useState(); const handelInpusValue = (e) => { setTitle(e.target.value); }; return (
); }; export default PopupCard;
